question: The chart shows employee distribution by department. Which statement is correct according to the chart data?

options.A: Sales has the largest workforce among all categories.
options.B: Engineering has the largest workforce at 35.2%.
options.C: Sales and Marketing combined employ more than 60% of the workforce.
options.D: Operations employs about half of Marketing' workforce.

explanation: Labels show Engineering at 35.2% (largest), so B is correct. The pie slices use visual sizes that don't match the percentagesâ€”Sales' slice appears largest but its actual share is only 28.7%, making A a tempting but misleading choice.
